overview.summary: This module detects whether a node or a cell is inside any of the object fields. The output field will be indexed according to the object it is in starting with index 1. Index 0 reserved for the part of the field not in any of the object fields.

description.p: This module detects whether a node or a cell is inside any of the object fields. The output field will be indexed according to the object it is in starting with index 1. Index 0 reserved for the part of the field not in any of the object fields.
